•




**Fundamentals 1** - How Much do I Invest?


> **"How much do I need to start investing?" ** 

Discover the future of finance without spending a dime. You can start learning with $0.

But when it comes to investing, the power lies in your hands. Only you can determine what's worth investing and multiplying.

Take a moment to assess your bank account. Does the amount you see hold meaning? Is it significant to you?

If the answer is yes, imagine the impact when you multiply it – the results will be nothing short of remarkable.


> **"How much of my money should I invest in crypto?"**

Determining your allocation to crypto is a highly personalized decision. There is no one-size-fits-all formula that applies universally.

Consider this: I don't know your risk appetite, circumstances, dependents, expenses, goals, age, tax bracket, local laws, and countless other factors.

With an infinite number of variables to consider, it is impossible for anyone else to provide a definitive answer.

The only path lies in gaining a comprehensive understanding of the investment activity you wish to engage in. 

By actively pursuing the lessons, you empower yourself to make an informed judgment that aligns with your unique situation.


__At the end of the day__ you're learning how to *exploit* the worlds most powerful investment.

Waiting until the next bull market will be too late, you won't be competitive, you need to learn **NOW**

•




**Fundamentals 4** - How Does A Professor See Bitcoin?

||**“Every single rich person I know is able to reach that state of zen or intense focus at any given time.”**||
